body.p:
To his Excellency
Gov Thomas E Bramlette

At the Nov Term of the Harrison Circuit Court. Geo Sidle was convicted of the crime of manslaughter in shooting Richd Jamison. and sentenced to be confined in the state penitentiary for the term of 2 years & 11 months. We the undersigned citizens of Harrison Co Ky do most respectfully petition his Excellency that the same Geo Sidle be pardoned --
